content: Thanks for booking everything for me. I really appreciate it. Now that I have my travel arrangements taken care of, I was wondering if you could help me with something else. I want to send a care package to my mom's best friend with some comforting items, like a cozy blanket, a favorite book, and some soothing teas. Do you have any recommendations for online stores that could deliver these items quickly, or any other ideas for care package items that might be appreciated?
